trans-unit.source: Represents a condition that must be taken into account when assessing the validity of a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma condição que deve ser levada em conta ao avaliar a validade de uma asserção SAML.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions and a set of conditions that must be taken into account when assessing the validity of the SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>tokens de segurança especificam suas declarações usando asserções SAML e um conjunto de condições que devem ser levadas em conta ao avaliar a validade de asserção SAML.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: The SamlDoNotCacheCondition class represents one of the conditions defined by the SAML specification and it asserts that the SAML assertion must not be cached.
trans-unit.target: A classe SamlDoNotCacheCondition representa uma das condições definidas pela especificação de SAML e declara que a declaração SAML deve não ser armazenado em cache.

trans-unit.source: To specify this condition for a SAML assertion, add the SamlDoNotCacheCondition class to the collection returned by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.Conditions%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar essa condição de uma asserção SAML, adicione a classe de SamlDoNotCacheCondition a coleção retornada pelo <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.Conditions%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.Conditions%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the SamlDoNotCacheCondition is added as a condition to a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security token that is issued by a security token service for the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] client, a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] client does cache the security token.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > SamlDoNotCacheCondition o quando é adicionado como uma condição para um <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>token de segurança emitido por um serviço de token de segurança para o [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] cliente, um [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] o token de segurança do cache do cliente.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: Because the client does not inspect the contents of the issued token, the token is cached.
trans-unit.target: Porque o cliente não inspecionar o conteúdo do token emitido, o token é armazenado em cache.

trans-unit.source: The client is token agnostic for issued tokens type and processes it the returned issued token as an opaque XML element.
trans-unit.target: O cliente é independente de token para o tipo de tokens emitidos e processa retornado emitiu o token como um elemento XML opaco.

trans-unit.source: However, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] security never caches the received issued token on the service side; it only caches the claims that are extracted from it during the token authentication process.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] segurança nunca armazena em cache o recebido emitiu o token no lado do serviço; ele apenas armazena em cache as declarações que são extraídas de-lo durante o processo de autenticação de token.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition.IsReadOnly%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition.IsReadOnly%2A>propriedade `false`.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the properties of this instance are read-only.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se as propriedades desta instância são somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: To make this instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition> class read-only, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition.MakeReadOnly%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para tornar essa instância do <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition>chamada de classe somente leitura, o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition.MakeReadOnly%2A>método.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition.MakeReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the properties of this instance are read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as propriedades desta instância são somente leitura; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Causes this instance to be read-only.
trans-unit.target: Faz com que essa instância para ser somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: When the MakeReadOnly method is called, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition.IsReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true` and properties of this instance can no longer be set.
trans-unit.target: Quando o método MakeReadOnly é chamado, o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition.IsReadOnly%2A>está definida como `true` e propriedades desta instância não podem ser definidas.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Reads the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:DoNotCacheCondition>" name="<saml:DoNotCacheCondition>" href=""></xref> element from the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: Lê o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:DoNotCacheCondition>" name="<saml:DoNotCacheCondition>" href=""> </xref> elemento do leitor de XML especificado.

trans-unit.source: The ReadXml method does note set any properties.
trans-unit.target: O método Observe de ReadXml defina todas as propriedades.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader> to read the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:DoNotCacheCondition>" name="<saml:DoNotCacheCondition>" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader> to read the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:DoNotCacheCondition>" name="<saml:DoNotCacheCondition>" href=""></xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of reading XML elements in the SAML authorization statement that is defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"> </xref> que é capaz de ler a declaração de autorização de SAML que é definido na especificação de SAML elementos XML.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that reads the <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clause of the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref> que lê o <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""> </xref> cláusula da assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that determines the security token that created the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"> </xref> que determina o token de segurança que criou a assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: reader is -or- samlSerializer is
trans-unit.target: readeris -or- samlSerializer is

trans-unit.source: reader does not point to a element.
trans-unit.target: readernão aponta para um elemento.

trans-unit.source: Writes the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:DoNotCacheCondition>" name="<saml:DoNotCacheCondition>" href=""></xref> element into the specified XML serializer.
trans-unit.target: Grava o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:DoNotCacheCondition>" name="<saml:DoNotCacheCondition>" href=""> </xref> elemento para o serializador XML especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use the WriteXml method to write the current <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition> instance into a `<saml:DoNotCacheCondition>` element.
trans-unit.target: Use o método WriteXml para gravar atual <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition>instância em um `<saml:DoNotCacheCondition>` elemento.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter> to write the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:DoNotCacheCondition>" name="<saml:DoNotCacheCondition>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter>para gravar o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:DoNotCacheCondition>" name="<saml:DoNotCacheCondition>" href=""> </xref> elemento.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing XML elements in a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"> </xref> que é capaz de gravar elementos XML em uma asserção SAML.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clauses.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref> que é capaz de gravar <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""> </xref> cláusulas.

trans-unit.source: writer is -or- samlSerializer is
trans-unit.target: writeris -or- samlSerializer is
